    Semanticrules

    Primitivesα∈T,cα∈Cons,uα∈Vars,Constants⟦cα⟧M=V(cα)Variables⟦uα⟧g=g(uα)Top⟦⊤α⟧=DαApplicationα∈T,uα∈Vars,dα∈D,termsA,⟦λuα(A)⟧g=⟦A⟧g[uα→d]Identityα∈T,termsAandB,⟦Aα=Bα⟧=1if⟦Aα⟧=⟦Bα⟧0otherwise BooleansA:(et),B:(et)t,⟦¬φ⟧=⟦⊤⟧/φ⟦φ∧ψ⟧=⟦φ⟧⋂⟦ψ⟧⟦φ∨ψ⟧=⟦φ⟧⋃⟦ψ⟧Quantifiersue∈Vars,φ:(st),⟦∀ueφ⟧g=1if⟦φ⟧g[x→ue]=1forallue0otherwise ⟦∃ueφ⟧g=1if⟦φ⟧g[x→ue]=1forsomeue0otherwise BarepluralsA:(et),B:(et)t,R:π,⟦∀R(A)(B)⟧=1if⟦A⟧∈R⟦A⟧⊆⟦B⟧0otherwise

    • Icontendthatconversationcommonlyrealizesacollaborativeinquiry,whichistosaythatsuccessfulcontributiontothediscourserequirestheeffortsofmultiplepartiesworkinginconcert,notjustserially.Itisthegoalofthisprojecttoexplain,motivate,andprovideamodelofimplementationforthisidea,whatIcallcollaborativediscoursedynamics.
